page.title: 04Ecology-Pamber Forest (ctd.)
page.content: It is impossible to list all the plants and creatures that inhabit the Common.Following are some that exist at present. {Flora:}Gorse,Ling,Calluna,Heather, Cross leaved Heath,Sundew,Early Purple,Butterfly and Heath Orchids, Silver Birch,Oak and Bilberry. {Fauna:}Roe and Fallow deer,Foxes, Hedgehogs,Nightjars,Adders,Common Lizards,Slow Worms,Rabbits,Weasels, Stoats,Voles,Mice and Shrews. The information comes from our own observbations and the records of the warden Mr.Martin Davey. {Pamber Forest { }There has been continuous forest cover since the end of the last ice age.Pamber Forest contains plant species that usually exist and originated in woodland conditions.
